Each appointment should 
have	a	specific	purpose.	You	
will need longer appointments 
early in pregnancy to allow 
plenty of time for your midwife 
or doctor to assess you, 
discuss your care and give 
you information. Wherever 
possible, the appointments 
should include any routine 
tests.
